Detailed Description

The QsciLexerDiff class encapsulates the Scintilla Diff lexer.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

This enum defines the meanings of the different styles used by the Diff lexer.

Enumerator:
Default  The default.
Comment  A comment.
Command  A command.
Header  A header.
Position  A position.
LineRemoved  A removed line.
LineAdded  An added line.

Member Function Documentation

const char* QsciLexerDiff::language (  )  const [virtual]

Returns the name of the language.

Implements QsciLexer.

const char* QsciLexerDiff::lexer (  )  const [virtual]

Returns the name of the lexer. Some lexers support a number of languages.

Implements QsciLexer.

QColor QsciLexerDiff::color ( int  style  )  const [virtual]

Returns the foreground colour of the text for style number style.

See also:
paper()

Reimplemented from QsciLexer.

QString QsciLexerDiff::description ( int  style  )  const [virtual]

Returns the descriptive name for style number style. If the style is invalid for this language then an empty QString is returned. This is intended to be used in user preference dialogs.

Implements QsciLexer.
